p: On the other hand, the technical disadvantages associated with the manufacturing process of ODT tablets could be solved by three-dimensional drug printing technology. Generally speaking, this technology is supported by the following processes: a program capable of generating a file is required with the necessary information for printing the drug. This same program (also present on the computer that will control the printer) must be able to read the instructions contained in the generated file and convert it into precise commands for the 3D printer to generate the part [ 55].
